Doc: A weather leg of a Commodity Swap defines Weather Index Swap transactions. Weather Index Swap transactions are OTC derivative transactions which settle financially based on an index calculated from observations of temperature, precipitation and other weather-related measurements at weather stations throughout the world. Sub-Annex C of the 2005 ISDA Commodity Definitions provides definitions and terms for a number of types of weather indices. These indices include: HDD (heating degree days), CDD (cooling degree days), CPD (critical precipitation days). Weather Index Swap transactions result in a cash flow to one of the two counterparties each Calculation Period depending on the relationship between the Settlement Level and the Weather Index Level. A Weather Index swap transaction always consists of a commodity swap element as a parent to two weatherLeg elements.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A weather leg of a Commodity Swap defines Weather Index Swap transactions. Weather Index Swap transactions are OTC derivative transactions which settle financially based on an index calculated from observations of temperature, precipitation and other weather-related measurements at weather stations throughout the world. Sub-Annex C of the 2005 ISDA Commodity Definitions provides definitions and terms for a number of types of weather indices. These indices include: HDD (heating degree days), CDD (cooling degree days), CPD (critical precipitation days). Weather Index Swap transactions result in a cash flow to one of the two counterparties each Calculation Period depending on the relationship between the Settlement Level and the Weather Index Level. A Weather Index swap transaction always consists of a commodity swap element as a parent to two weatherLeg elements.
 #/
record FpML5.recordkeeping.WeatherLeg {
  # A reference to the party responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
  payerPartyReference : FpML5.recordkeeping.PartyReference

  # A reference to the account responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
  payerAccountReference : FpML5.recordkeeping.AccountReference?

  # A reference to the party that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
  receiverPartyReference : FpML5.recordkeeping.PartyReference?

  # A reference to the account that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
  receiverAccountReference : FpML5.recordkeeping.AccountReference?

  # Defining the Weather Index Level or Weather Index Strike Level.
  weatherIndexLevel : FpML5.recordkeeping.WeatherIndex

  weatherCalculationPeriods : FpML5.recordkeeping.WeatherCalculationPeriods

  weatherCalculationPeriodsReference : FpML5.recordkeeping.CalculationPeriodsReference

  # Defines the price per weather index unit.
  weatherNotionalAmount : FpML5.recordkeeping.NonNegativeMoney

  # Defines details relevant to the calculation of the aggregate weather index amount.
  calculation : FpML5.recordkeeping.WeatherLegCalculation

  # The Payment Dates of the trade relative to the Calculation Periods or Calculation Date
  paymentDates : FpML5.recordkeeping.CommodityRelativePaymentDates?

  # Specifies where the data (e.g. CPD) have been collected, an actual physical reference point (weather station) and various fall back arrangements.
  weatherIndexData : FpML5.recordkeeping.WeatherIndexData?

  id : string?

}

payerPartyReference.Doc: A reference to the party responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
payerPartyReference.Name: payerPartyReference

payerAccountReference.Doc: A reference to the account responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
payerAccountReference.Name: payerAccountReference

receiverPartyReference.Doc: A reference to the party that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
receiverPartyReference.Name: receiverPartyReference

receiverAccountReference.Doc: A reference to the account that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
receiverAccountReference.Name: receiverAccountReference

weatherIndexLevel.Doc: Defining the Weather Index Level or Weather Index Strike Level.
weatherIndexLevel.Name: weatherIndexLevel

weatherNotionalAmount.Doc: Defines the price per weather index unit.
weatherNotionalAmount.Name: weatherNotionalAmount

calculation.Doc: Defines details relevant to the calculation of the aggregate weather index amount.
calculation.Name: calculation

paymentDates.Doc: The Payment Dates of the trade relative to the Calculation Periods or Calculation Date
paymentDates.Name: paymentDates

weatherIndexData.Doc: Specifies where the data (e.g. CPD) have been collected, an actual physical reference point (weather station) and various fall back arrangements.
weatherIndexData.Name: weatherIndexData
